name: Sea Queen Otohime
cardText:
[evolve][cost02]: Evolve this follower.
[fanfare] Summon an Otohime's Bodyguard token.

name: Sea Queen Otohime (Evolved)
cardText: On Evolve: Summon 3 Otohime's Bodyguard tokens. If your field becomes full from this effect, put any remaining tokens into your EX area.

name: Aurelia, Regal Saber
cardText:
Rush. Assail. Ward.
[fanfare] Select an enemy leader. If there are at least 3 cards on their field, give this follower [attack]+2/[defense]+2 and Aura.

name: Shadowed Assassin
cardText:
[evolve][cost02]: Evolve this follower.
[fanfare] Select an enemy follower on the field and engage it.

name: Shadowed Assassin (Evolved)
cardText: On Evolve: Select an engaged enemy follower and destroy it.

name: Frontguard General
cardText:
Ward.
[lastwords] Summon 2 Steelclad Knight tokens and give them Ward. You may engage any number of them.

name: Alwida's Command
cardText: Summon a Viking, Steelclad Knight, and Knight token.

name: Royal Banner
cardText:
[fanfare] Give each [swordcraft] follower on your field [attack]+1/[defense]+1.

cardText: [evolve][cost02]: Evolve this follower.

cardText: [fanfare] Search your deck for a [swordcraft] follower, reveal it, and add it to your hand.

cardText:

name: Pompous Princess
cardText: [fanfare] Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may put a follower that costs 1 play point from among them onto your field. Put the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Ninja Master
cardText: [fanfare] Search your deck for a Ninja card, reveal it, and add it to your hand.
